articles.description: Scientists credit the rise to more transmissible coronavirus variants and governments prematurely rolling back restrictions.
articles.content: The end of the pandemic may be in sight, but were not quite there yet: Coronavirus cases in the United States are on the rise again. Over the past week, the U.S. has reported an average of 61,583 new… [+1582 chars]
